snippet.title: Heavenly Bodies Teaser
snippet.description:
A game about cosmonauts, the body, and the absence of gravity.

Coming soon.

---

Discover the ever-changing nuances of weightless motion with Heavenly Bodies – a single and local-multiplayer, physics-focused game on its way to PC and Mac. Wrangle the hands and arms of space cosmonauts and push, pull and twist your way through a precarious range of physically-simulated stellar scenarios where, without gravity, nothing is still, nothing is secure, and nothing is simple.

Website: https://heavenlybodiesgame.com
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1138850/Heavenly_Bodies/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/2ptStudio
